Crash: Range:(-inf, inf)',  # Output is -1 if a collision occurs, otherwise 0.
MeanVelocity: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Output is based on the absolute difference from the target velocity, which can be unbounded.
MinVelocity: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Penalizes lower speeds, thus producing values from negative to zero.
SquaredSpeedAboveMax: Range: [0, inf)',  # Penalizes exceeding the maximum speed, producing non-negative values.
FuelProxy: Range: [0, inf)',  # Penalizes fuel consumption, producing non-negative values.
BreakPenalty: Range: [0, inf)',  # Penalizes hard braking events, producing non-negative values.
HeadwayPenalty: Range: [0, inf)',  # Penalizes short headways, producing non-negative values.
